resources.string: Please take a picture within the viewfinder rectangle.
Are you sure you want to exit the program?
Error occurred in image being sent.
Are you sure you want to \ndelete the Secret View image?
Are you sure you want to \ndelete saved password?
Are you sure you want to \ndelete saved voice recording?
Are you sure you want to \ndelete saved URL?
Are you sure you want to \ndelete saved phone number?
Please check your Android OS version. (Must be higher than 4.1)
Keep connected to the end of printing.
Sending to the printer has been completed.
Image size should be higher than 240 pixels.
The printer is not connected.\nPlease check the connection.
You can enter up to 30 characters.
You can enter up to 26 characters.
Unable to create an image file.
"Secret View" mode helps to send secret message in image.
Secret message can be made using "Secret View Creation Icon"
Secret message made by text, emoticon, voice is not seen when being printed.
"Secret View Image Reader" mode helps to read secret message.
Tapping "delete" marks checkbox on the image.
Selected image will be deleted by tapping "delete" after choosing.
The see the secret message use the icon of
There are currently several people printing!
Please take a picture within the viewfinder rectangle in accordance with QR code.
Check if you don`t want to see it again.
Check the power of image box.
This page doesn`t support NFC automatic printing. If you want automatic printing, please go back to previous page and tag it again.
Disconnecting power or arbitrary operating during upgrade may cause failure of the device.
Now installing‚Ä¶ Please wait for device power-off.
We need some of the permissions you rejected or the system failed to apply failed, please manually set to the page authorize, otherwise the function can\'t be used normally!
You have rejected us to apply for authorization, please agree to authorization, otherwise the function can\'t be used normally!

Location information is turned off. Printer search is possible only when location information is provided. will you do it?
\nPlease update the firmware to the latest version.\n(F/W update: Connection settings ‚Üí Update)
Give a nickname and decorate your image box with sticker.
Pick up the picture that you like to print.
With NFC, simply tagging the printer makes\n
your smartphone become an instant Camera.\n
With NFC, simply tagging the printer makes your smartphone become an instant Camera.
iTalk will deliver your hidden message under QR Code.
iGift will provide diverse selections of picture\n
frames such as label, collage, sticker.\n

Please load a new paper pack
Put the paper into the paper tray.

A cleaning sheet is coming out.

All the created contents will be disappeared.
